meanings.definition: To be determined by or based on something else
meanings.sent1: The outcome of the experiment depends on the temperature of the water.
meanings.sent2: My decision to go outside depends on whether it's raining or not.
meanings.sent3: His success depends on the mood of his boss, which can be quite unpredictable.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness depends on a delicate balance of work and play.
meanings.sent5: The growth of the plant depends on the amount of sunlight it receives each day.

meanings.definition: To rely on or be influenced by something else
meanings.sent1: I depend on my alarm clock to wake me up in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The team's success depends on each player doing their part.
meanings.sent3: His cat depends on him for food and cuddles every day.
meanings.sent4: The fragile ecosystem depends on the presence of certain key species.
meanings.sent5: The outcome of the game depends on how well the players work together as a team.

meanings.definition: To vary or change based on different factors
meanings.sent1: The cost of the project depends on the materials used and the labor involved.
meanings.sent2: Her mood depends on a combination of sleep, food, and exercise.
meanings.sent3: The flavor of the soup depends on the amount of salt added.
meanings.sent4: The outcome of the race depends on the weather conditions on the day.
meanings.sent5: The color of the sky depends on the time of day and the weather.
